thread.title: VW Brand Chief Welcomes Debate on Auto Tariffs

author: William Boston
title: VW Brand Chief Welcomes Debate on Auto Tariffs
text:
BERLIN—The chief executive of Volkswagen AG’s namesake VW brand said Wednesday that the Trump administration is justified in questioning the wide discrepancy between import duties imposed by the U.S. and the European Union on auto imports.
The comments from Herbert Diess during a news conference in Wolfsburg, Germany, are the first from a senior European auto executive to lend support to President Donald Trump’s allegation that the gap in import duties on cars was unfair to U.S. exports to Europe.
